dc:description: Bronze sistrum handle in fair condition.  Long round column upon which is mounted a capital, both sides of which show the face of the goddess Hathor.  Also a half dog(?) peers out of the top of capital.  Rough brown surface.  Part of the upper portion is broken off.  Bright green corrosion.
